title: Kinnikuman: Kessen! Shichinin no Choujin tai Uchuu Nobushi
synopsis: A TV Special first aired in 1984. It covers the Planet Rakka story arc and takes place after the 21st Choujin Olympics Arc. A young boy from Planet Rakka named Beansman asks Kinnikuman and the others to help save his planet from the Space Samurais led by Black King. The story was a parody of The Seven Samurai.
voices: ['Kamiya, Akira', 'Gouri, Daisuke', 'Kanie, Eiji', 'Tanaka, Ryouichi', 'Mizutori, Tetsuo', 'Tanaka, Hideyuki', 'Kitagawa, Yonehiko', 'Futamata, Issei', 'Satou, Masaharu', 'Mizutori, Tetsuo']
